4317300.name: Dark and Darker - EA#8 Seasonal Pack
4317300.description:
Dark and Darker EA Season 8 – Ignite the Forge!

The Emberforge has opened its gates for Season 8! Embrace the heat of the abyss with the new Seasonal Pack. This season, we’ve combined highly requested permanent cosmetics with essential supplies to fuel your dungeon crawling.

EA#8 Seasonal Pack Contents:

Permanent Collection Items (Yours Forever!)

  • Lobby Skin: Emberforge Hall – Transform your lobby into a hall of living flame.

  • Soulheart Skin: Molten Heart – Let your spirit burn bright even in defeat.

Seasonal Limited Item

  • Season-exclusive Shared Stash – Easily transfer loot between your characters all season long.

Adventurer’s Supply Bundle (Seasonal Consumables)

  • Gold Pouch (Non-tradable) +1 

  • Common Bandage (3) x12

  • Common Potion of Healing (3) x12

  • Common Potion of Protection (3) x12

  • Common Magic Protection Potion (3) x12

  • Common Lockpick (3) x12

Important:

  • The Seasonal Pack is non-refundable.

  • Permanent Collection Items (Lobby Skin, Soulheart Skin) are kept forever.

  • Seasonal Limited Items (Shared Stash and Consumables) will expire and be removed when the next season begins.

  • Get the pack early to maximize your dungeon efficiency from day one!
4317300.supported_languages: 英语, 韩语, 日语, 简体中文, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 繁体中文
